titleStmt.title: Manchesters ioy for Derbies overthrow, or, An exact relation of a famous victory obtained by the Manchester forces against the Lord Strange, Earle of Derby at Warrington in Lancashire, where the said Earle was beaten into a steeple with the losse of many of his men : with a true declaration of what ensued thereupon : published to prevent mis-information.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
